Package com.varukha.webproject.util.calculator

Interface CalculatorStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
CargoPriceCalculator, DocumentPriceCalculator, ParcelPriceCalculator
public interface CalculatorStrategy
Interface CalculatorStrategy contain contracts of methods for calculating delivery price by order type and total delivery price.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dmytro Varukha

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    getOrderPrice(String orderType, String weight, String length, String height, String width, String firstCity, String secondCity, String deliveryType)
    Method getOrderPrice used to calculate delivery price by order type.
    BigDecimal

    Method getPriceByDeliveryDistance used to calculate price that depend on the order type.

  • Method Details

    • getOrderPrice

      BigDecimal getOrderPrice(String orderType, String weight, String length, String height, String width, String firstCity, String secondCity, String deliveryType) throws IncorrectInputException
      Method getOrderPrice used to calculate delivery price by order type.
      Parameters:
      orderType - type of order from user input.
      weight - order weight.
      height - order height.
      length - order length.
      width - order width.
      firstCity - sender city.
      secondCity - receiver city.
      deliveryType - order delivery type.
      Returns:
      delivery price by order type.
      Throws:
      IncorrectInputException - is an exception that throws during the runtime because of incorrect data input.

    • getPriceByDeliveryType

      BigDecimal getPriceByDeliveryType(String deliveryType, String firstCity, String secondCity) throws IncorrectInputException
      Method getPriceByDeliveryType used to calculate price that depend on the order type. In that method take into account delivery type and delivery location. Depend on location (within one city or between two cities) price is changed.
      Parameters:
      firstCity - sender city.
      secondCity - receiver city.
      deliveryType - order delivery type.
      Returns:
      price by delivery type.
      Throws:
      IncorrectInputException - is an exception that throws depending on the availability of delivery within the same city or different cities and the type of order delivery.

    • getPriceByDeliveryDistance

      BigDecimal getPriceByDeliveryDistance(double deliveryDistance)
      Method getPriceByDeliveryDistance used to calculate price that depend on the order type. In that method take into account delivery type and delivery location. Depend on location (within one city or between two cities) price is changed.
      Parameters:
      deliveryDistance - delivery distance of order.
      Returns:
      price by delivery distance.
